name: Kudryavka Noumi Lora
description:
This is my first Lora that I have trained successfully.

It is trained on official art from Little Busters 10th Anniversary artbook and White Fairy artbook, as well as CG's and sprites from Little Busters and Kud Wafter games.

It does some weird things sometimes but it is usable and can produce cute pictures.

I will improve it as I learn more.

The trigger word is 'kud', her hat and mantle can be called with 'kud_hat' and 'kud_cape'.

'school_uniform' will call her uniform, but it may be winter or summer variant.

'Hair ornament' will call her hair pin, but it does not work very well.

If anyone knows where I can get scans of the 'Kosmonaut' artbook from the OVA limited edition I would like to add it to the dataset, but it is very hard to find online. Not even a picture of the cover.

meta.prompt: Masterpiece, Best Quality, kud, kud hat, kud cap, <lora:kud_lora-000010:1>
meta.negativePrompt: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, artist name
